Controller

Class IOController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.IOController

  • public class IOController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all input from standard input as well as some formatting methods.
    Version:
    1.0

      IOController()

      • readChoice

        public static int readChoice(int i,
                             int j)
        This method is to read an integer from standard input whose value should be in a certain range.
        Parameters:
        i - the lower bound (inclusive) of the input
        j - the upper bound (inclusive) of the input
        Returns:
        the input from standard input with specified range

      • addLinebreaks

        public static java.lang.String addLinebreaks(java.lang.String input,
                                             int maxLineLength,
                                             int lengthOfSpace)
        This method is to add line breaks for a String whose length exceeds a certain value as well as adding spaces to the second line onwards.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to be formatted
        maxLineLength - the maximum length a line can be
        lengthOfSpace - the number of spaces to be added to the second line onwards
        Returns:
        the formatted String

        This method is to read an Email address from standard input.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be shown to the user
        Returns:
        the input from standard input with Email format

        Returns:

                                 java.util.Date d2)

        Parameters:
        d1 - the first Date to be compared
        d2 - the second Date to be compared
